vampire.config_products.CHIRPSLongtermAverageProductImpl module¶

class vampire.config_products.CHIRPSLongtermAverageProductImpl.CHIRPSLongtermAverageProductImpl(country, product_date, interval, vampire_defaults)[source]¶

Bases: vampire.config_products.RasterProductImpl.RasterProductImpl

CHIRPS long-term average.

Data handling for generating CHIRPS long-term averages.

generate_config(input_dir=None, output_dir=None, input_pattern=None, output_pattern=None, functions=None, download=True)[source]¶

Generate a config file process for CHIRPS long-term average product.

Generate VAMPIRE config file processes to generate long-term averages from CHIRPS data.

Parameters:
  • input_dir (string) – Directory path for CHIRPS precipitation files. Default is None.
  • output_dir (string) – Path for product output. If the output_dir is None, the VAMPIRE default rainfall anomaly product directory will be used.
  • input_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern for finding CHIRPS precipitation files. Default is None.
  • output_pattern (string) – Pattern for specifying output filename. Used in conjuction with input_pattern. Default is None.
  • functions (list of string) – List of functions to calculate. Valid options include ‘AVG’, ‘MIN’, ‘MAX’, ‘STD’.
  • download (bool) – Flag indicating whether data should be downloaded or not.
Returns:

Returns string containing the configuration file process.
Return type:

string
generate_header()[source]¶

Generate VAMPIRE config file header for CHIRPS long-term average datasets.

Returns:Returns config file header section.
Return type:string
generate_longterm_average_section(input_dir, output_dir, input_pattern, output_pattern, functions)[source]¶

Generate config file string for CHIRPS long-term average product.

Generate VAMPIRE config file string to generate long-term averages from CHIRPS data.

Parameters:
  • input_dir (string) – Directory path for CHIRPS precipitation files. Default is None.
  • output_dir (string) – Path for product output. If the output_dir is None, the VAMPIRE default rainfall anomaly product directory will be used.
  • input_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern for finding CHIRPS precipitation files. Default is None.
  • output_pattern (string) – Pattern for specifying output filename. Used in conjuction with input_pattern. Default is None.
  • functions (list of string) – List of functions to calculate. Valid options include ‘AVG’, ‘MIN’, ‘MAX’, ‘STD’.
Returns:

Returns string containing the configuration file process.
Return type:

string
